entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GCStress=3 has gotten very slow on osx-arm64 #114581
    10.0.0
  • The Android logging support has broken a diagnostics exception handling test #114579
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varTypeIsUnsigned(srcLoadType) || (genTypeSize(srcLoadType) >= genTypeSize(castType))' #114573
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug/Release generate different results #114572
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug: Throws 'System.NullReferenceException', Release: Runs successfully #114571
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' #114570
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' #114569
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.Or/And for enums #114568
  • Remove `ymm` embedded rounding code in JIT and AVX10 APIs #114566
    10.0.0
  • Tune conditional compare optimizations for APX #114564
  • Add remaining APX NCI instructions to emitter #114563
  • Optimize and tune APX NDD form codegen #114562
  • Tune LSRA with APX EGPR #114561
  • Enable and optimize LSRA with APX push2/pop2 #114560
  • Enable EGPR for `GenTree` nodes that lower to promoted VEX/EVEX encoding. #114559
  • XDocument.LoadAsync doesn't respect Cancellation token #114555
  • [mono][wasm][linux] Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform #114552
  • Updating to .Net Framework / .Net Core 8 from .Net Framework .Net Core 6 seems to come with performance penalties #114551
  • SerialPort 读取数据被分片的问题 麻烦看清楚在关我的issues #114547
  • ILC error in BenchmarkDotNet #114544
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() doesn't support localized display names #114543
    Future
  • error NU1004: The package reference Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks version has changed from [8.0.14, ) to [8.0.15, ). #114536
  • [API Proposal]: `ProviderAliasAttribute`: Better move to `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` #114532
    Future
  • [browser] hot reload tests deadlock on linux #114526
    Future

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99315
    10.0.0
  • InstrumentAdvice<T> doesn't show up for .NETStandard 2.0/2.1 class library #114553
  • CLR_DOTNET_RID is not set #114538
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default on OSX ARM64 #109395
  • MetadataUpdateHandler not working in custom host #113452
    Future
  • SerialPort 读取数据被分片的问题 #114539
  • StackOverFlowException no longer breaks into the debugger on F5, instead the app hangs #114412
    10.0.0
  • Test failure in RunReflectionScenario_UnsafeRead #113553
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: change 'Unsafe.AsPointer' parameter to be 'ref readonly' #114189
    10.0.0
  • Is `InlineArray16<T>` intentionally excluded? #114514
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/throwbox/filter/filter.dll #113815
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add an IsFuncletCache to the EECodeInfo #114580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent DynamicOptimization test from running with DOTNET_ForceRelocs=1 #114578
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable AVX2 optimistically with AVX on NAOT #114575
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: Fix checking encapsulation key size #114574
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • ILLink : Test API expsure #114567
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Make sure we add the System.Private.* assemblies when using the NativeAOT runtime pack as the runtime package. #114556
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][coreclr] Make libs subset build #114548
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Added missing clearing of pooled arrays #114545
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a type for call emission parameters #114542
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix verify_free_list #114540
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add breaking change rule for adding partial modifier to interface methods #114537
    area-Meta
  • Increase timeout on fuzzing deployment pipeline #114535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Define which assets to preload #114534
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Again adjust for culture name normalization in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #114531
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [clr-interp] Add support for virtual method calls #114529
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [H/3] Clean up and fix Alt-Svc handling #114528
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Handle DelayFree for HW_Category_SIMDByIndexedElement intrinsics #114525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add native library network support #114523
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Haiku: Add native library IO support #114521
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, os-haiku

Merged

  • Disable JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default on osx-arm64 #114554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add minipal_getexepath implementation #114519
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Use NOTIFY_ON_U2M_TRANSITIONS in SfiInit/SfiNext #114496
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Define `libroot.so` as the `libc` #114522
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114391
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.5
  • Only remove publishing workload manifests in the runtime join job #114558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #114498
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Use the regular build scripts for -vs coreclr.sln #114511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ignore CLR_DOTNET_RID when using stub cdac #114541
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Move DAC signing identity to PME #114032
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.5
  • Use regex to match version in MicroBuild workaround #114549
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Avoid doing extra lookups when not needed #114517
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Haiku: Fix context register name #114518
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Haiku: Fix IPC socket #114520
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Remove setting `$ORIGIN/netcoredeps` rpath #114512
    area-Host
  • Don't publish all workload manifest packages, not just the msi ones #114527
    needs-area-label
  • Fix issue when logging stack overflow in WinForm apps. #114432
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Force storing GC state until we see a labeled IG #114475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove useless argument from RedirectForThrowControl #114444
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.NETCore.CoreDisTools nuget package from 1.4 to 1.5 #114507
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use 'ref readonly' in 'Unsafe.AsPointer' #114406
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add `InlineArray16<T>` #114515
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Support W3C Propagator #114583
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Print load immediate value in disassembly #114470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Zip async implementation #114421
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add internal intrinsics for instance-based calli #114495
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2685315 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Add support to add new FieldRVAs to EnC #114463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • SLH-DSA implementation for OpenSSL #114060
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [DRAFT] Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Move lower 12 bits of indirection address to load / store offset #114488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fix loop recognition bug in .NET 8 #114457
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.16
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging][wasm] remove problematic default settings #112216
    area-Workloads, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114078
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114273
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114077
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #114509
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Optimize `BigInteger.Multiply` by Toom-Cook multiplication #112876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Remove a few more instances of unsafe code in STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • [BLOCKED] System.CommandLine update #111864
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Console, blocked
  • Replace OptimizedInboxTextEncoder vectorization with SearchValues #114494
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate MacCatalyst and iOS/tvOS simulator jobs to `osx.14.arm64.open` and `osx.15.amd64.open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [coreclr][android] Don't build/ship unused GC variants for Android #114448
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Optimize Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #111050
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Place read-only non-GC static bases into read-only section #114477
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify handling `Span` in the cctor interpreter #114487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
